content:
I'm looking forward to seeing many of you at the FHIR Connectathon Bulk Data Track in Baltimore on September 29th and 30th!

If you're new to the track or have questions or issues that you'd like to raise, we've scheduled an orientation call this Thursday (9/13) at 10AM ET (sorry for the last minute notice, finding a time that worked was challenging, but the call will be recorded). The track definition is at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201809_Bulk_Data , the bulk data documentation is at https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/fhir-bulk-data-docs and the meeting details are as follows:

Please join my meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/945115453

You can also dial in using your phone.
United States: +1 (872) 240-3212

Access Code: 945-115-453

Regards,
Dan
I missed this on here but Isaac is on the ball and forwarded it to me. I'll be on the call tomorrow morning (and at the Connectathon).

Looking forward to seeing everyone folks at the Connectathon this weekend! We've set up a shared spreadsheet to list participants and the scenarios they're working on! Please feel free to edit the schema at will :-)
